output.sentences: We couldn't wait to arrive in the city to attend the festival.
The walls surrounding the city were cold as they were constructed from concrete.
The guards were intimidating as they all rode on horseback.
The tons of people all learned the city festival was simply a tramp sprund by the oppressive government.
What they had thought were fireworks ended up being something far more sinister.
